question: Can I qualify for a mortgage with an annual income of $75,000 and a credit score of 720?
true_answer: Yes, with a credit score of 720 and a DTI of 28%, you qualify. Down payment typically 3-20%.

steps.content: Can I qualify for a mortgage with an annual income of $75,000 and a credit score of 720?
Plan: 1) Consult home_loan_agent for eligibility criteria. 2) Check credit score with credit_agent. 3) Calculate DTI ratio. 4) Get supervisor review. 5) Provide answer.
Eligibility generally requires a credit score above 620 and a DTI below 43%.
Credit score 720 is excellent and above the minimum requirement.
Calculating debt-to-income ratio assuming average debts.
Calculated DTI is 28%, which is well below the threshold.
How much should I prepare for a down payment?
Retrieving information on typical down payment requirements.
Standard down payment ranges from 3% to 20% depending on loan type.
Is there anything else I should consider?
All criteria checked, no additional factors needed.
Yes, with a credit score of 720 and a DTI of 28%, you qualify. Down payment typically 3-20%.
